title: What the Package Does (Title Case)
text: goal RiskMap provide set functions visualisation, processing likelihood-based analysis geostatistical data.

title: What the Package Does (Title Case)
text: basic example shows solve common problem: special using README.Rmd instead just README.md? can include R chunks like : ’ll still need render README.Rmd regularly, keep README.md --date. devtools::build_readme() handy . also use GitHub Actions re-render README.Rmd every time push. example workflow can found : https://github.com/r-lib/actions/tree/v1/examples. can also embed plots, example:  case, don’t forget commit push resulting figure files, display GitHub CRAN.
code: library(RiskMap) ## basic example code summary(cars) #>      speed           dist        #>  Min.   : 4.0   Min.   :  2.00   #>  1st Qu.:12.0   1st Qu.: 26.00   #>  Median :15.0   Median : 36.00   #>  Mean   :15.4   Mean   : 42.98   #>  3rd Qu.:19.0   3rd Qu.: 56.00   #>  Max.   :25.0   Max.   :120.00

what: Heavy metal biomonitoring in Galicia — liberia
title: Heavy metal biomonitoring in Galicia — liberia
text: data-set contains counts reported onchocerciasis (riverblindess) cases 91 villages sampled across Liberia.  variables follows: lat latitude sampled villages. long longitude sampled villages. ntest number tested people presence nodules. npos number people tested positive presence nodules. elevation elevation meters sampled village. log_elevation log-transformed elevation meters sampled village.
